name: AutoCrossCorrelationTiltImageAlignment
label: Auto Tilt Image Align (XCORR)
description: Automatically align tilt images by cross-correlation

parameters.name: transform_source
parameters.label: Transformation Source
parameters.description: The source of the transformation shifts (i. e., generate them, load them from a file, etc.)

parameters.name: transforms_save_file
parameters.label: Save Transformations File
parameters.description: Save transformations file to apply to other datasets later. Leave this blank to not save it.

parameters.name: apply_to_all_arrays
parameters.label: Apply to All Arrays
parameters.description: Apply the transformation shifts to all arrays within this data source (not just the currently selected one). The transformation is computed only using the currently selected array.
